document.full_text: a former u.s. border patrol agent was sentenced to a prison term of 30 years to life on tuesday for a bloody hatchet attack on a sleeping couple he mistook for his estranged wife and her boyfriend.
document.title: former border agent gets 30 years to life in hatchet attack
lines_and_colors: a former u.s. border patrol agent was sentenced to a prison term of 30 years to life on tuesday for a bloody hatchet attack on a sleeping couple he mistook for his estranged wife and her boyfriend.
